articles.description: Wish you could see your Google Photos library in your phone's default gallery app? OnePlus, OPPO, Realme, and Xiaomi now offer this option.
articles.content:
• OPPO, OnePlus, Realme, and Xiaomi phones now have Google Photos integration in their gallery apps.
  • This integration lets you see your Google Photos library in the OEM gallery app.
